subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce scored 18 of his 27 points in the first quarter and Kevin Garnett added 23 last night as the Boston Celtics defeated the Miami Heat, 95-85. Ray Allen scored 17 points for the Celtics, who missed 12 of 13 shots over eight and a half minutes late in the game — a drought that allowed Miami to rally.
